SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Column
Specifies that a field within an entity class corresponds to a database column.
DatabaseManager
Manages the database connection pool and provides utility methods for acquiring and closing database connections.
DataCoreAPI
DataCoreAPI is a utility class that provides static methods for accessing and managing the repository system and database in the application.
DataCorePlugin
 
Entity
This annotation marks a class as an entity that maps to a specific database table.
GeneratedValue
Indicates that the value for a field in an entity class should be generated dynamically.
GeneratedValue.GenerationType
 
Query
An annotation used to associate a database query with a specific method.
Repository<T>
Represents a generic repository interface for managing entities of type T.
RepositoryFactory
A factory class responsible for creating repository implementations dynamically at runtime.
RepositoryRegistry
The RepositoryRegistry class is responsible for managing the lifecycle and retrieval of repository instances.
SchemaSynchronizer
The SchemaSynchronizer class is responsible for ensuring that the database schema is synchronized with the structure of annotated Java entity classes.
SQLTypeMapper
Utility for automatic mapping and conversion between Java and SQL types.
